name: Daily Dive
description:
You play as a bird who is diving down a cliff. How fast can you make it to the flag at the bottom? Used A/D to move, and S to dive faster! There is a new course generated every day, so try coming back tomorrow (or changing your clock) to generate a new course!

The game's time is based off of UTC, so the date displayed on the title screen might not match your computer's time.

This game was designed for Weekly Game Jam 132, where the theme was "Deep Dive". Admittedly, the game reuses some assets and code from my previous game, and given how quickly I made it, it's not very polished.

The game utilizes some collision algorithms from Jeffery Thompson (specifically line/circle), who allows them to be used in programming projects.

The font used in the game is ManualPrint by Aaron D. Chand, and is free for commercial use.
